attributes.action: Southestern Railway Metro Line Passenger Campaign
attributes.additional_details:
Commuters travelling to and from London using the Southeastern Railway Metro Line are suffering increasingly cancelled, delayed, and severely congested services.

Southeastern Railway continue to demonstrate that they have no concern as to whether their passengers arrive to work on time, collect their children on time, arrive at hospital appointments on time, college classes on time, or exams on time, nor how the individual is penalised as consequence for Southeastern Railway's incompetence.

This is not acceptable.

Southeastern passengers seek that Southeastern Railway relinquish operation of the Metro line to another operator.
